content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Duisburg, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price at this moment. Starting with a high figure in mind, I propose 1250 Euros per month. Now, if you find this acceptable and wish to move forward with this price, you can state 'I agree to the price of [1250] Euro!' Otherwise, let me know if you desire a lower amount for further negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to negotiate. Could you offer a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly Haoyu Wang, in an effort to reach an agreement, I reduce my initial offer to 1200 Euros per month for this apartment. If you find this revised price more acceptable and would like to proceed with this amount, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!' However, if this price is still not satisfactory for your budget, kindly share your proposed figure, and I will reconsider.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to negotiate. Could you offer a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, as I aim to find a mutually agreeable rental price for both parties, I slightly adjust the offer once more to 1150 Euros per month for this apartment. If this new price satisfies your budget requirements and you'd like to accept it, please say 'I agree to the price of [1150] Euro!' Should this figure not meet your expectations, please provide your desired rental amount, and I will reassess the situation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to negotiate. Could you offer a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Recognizing your desire to reach a reasonable rental agreement on this apartment, I adjust my offer one last time to 1100 Euros per month. If this price appeals to your budget and you wish to proceed with this figure, indicate your acceptance with 'I agree to the price of [1100] Euro!' However, if this amount does not match your financial constraints, I encourage you to convey your suggested price, and I will review the possibility of lowering it further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to negotiate. Could you offer a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I understand your persistence in seeking a lower rental price for this apartment in Duisburg. Since I'm keen on securing a tenant, I make one final concession and reduce my offer to 1050 Euros per month. Should this price align with your financial expectations and you are willing to accept it, please confirm by stating 'I agree to the price of [1050] Euro!' If this figure still fails to meet your criteria, I regretfully conclude our negotiation, as I cannot lower the price any further. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
